slide_shelf_in_again.description: Slide the shelf back into the dishwasher.

extract_shelf.description: Slide the shelf out from the dishwasher.

refresh_shelf.description: Clean the shelf in the dishwasher to remove any residues.

slide_in_shelf.description: Slide the shelf into the dishwasher.

slide_out_shelf.description: Slide the shelf out from the dishwasher.

clean_shelf.description: Clean the shelf in the dishwasher to remove any dirt or food particles.

twist_door_clockwise_once_more.description: Rotate the dishwasher's door clockwise again.

twist_door_counter_clockwise_now.description: Rotate the dishwasher's door counter-clockwise this time.

sanitize_rotation_door.description: Clean the dishwasher's door to maintain cleanliness and efficiency.

rotate_door_clockwise.description: Rotate the rotation door of the dishwasher clockwise.

rotate_door_anticlockwise.description: Rotate the rotation door of the dishwasher anticlockwise.

clean_rotation_door.description: Clean the rotation door of the dishwasher to maintain hygiene and operational efficiency.

tap_dishwasher_body_lightly.description: Gently tap the body of the dishwasher.

polish_dishwasher_body.description: Clean the body of the dishwasher to maintain hygienic standards.

press_dishwasher_body.description: Press the body of the dishwasher.

clean_dishwasher_body.description: Clean the body of the dishwasher to maintain cleanliness.

total_dishwasher_routine.description: Complete sequence for unloading and loading the dishwasher, now with a slight tap on the body in between.

sanitise_whole_dishwasher.description: Clean the entire dishwasher, making sure to cover the shelf, the door, and the dishwasher body for a total cleanup.

overall_dishwasher_sequence.description: Overall sequence from unloading to loading the dishwasher.

clean_entire_dishwasher.description: Clean the entire dishwasher, including the shelf, the rotation door, and the dishwasher body.
